verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* Asaph. Surely God \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* those \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w pure|strong="H1249"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

But \w as|strong="H7272"\w* \w for|strong="H7272"\w* me, \w my|strong="H8210"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* had \w almost|strong="H4592"\w* stumbled; \w my|strong="H8210"\w* \w steps|strong="H7272"\w* had nearly \w slipped|strong="H8210"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w envied|strong="H7065"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w arrogant|strong="H1984"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H7965"\w* \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* no struggle \w in|strong="H4194"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*; \w their|strong="H3588"\w* bodies \w are|strong="H4194"\w* well-fed.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* \w free|strong="H5973"\w* \w of|strong="H5999"\w* \w the|strong="H5060"\w* burdens others carry; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H5060"\w* \w like|strong="H5973"\w* other men.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w their|strong="H3651"\w* \w necklace|strong="H6059"\w*; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w garment|strong="H7897"\w* \w of|strong="H2555"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w covers|strong="H5848"\w* \w them|strong="H5848"\w*.

\w From|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H3318"\w* prosperity \w proceeds|strong="H3318"\w* iniquity; \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w imaginations|strong="H4906"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H3318"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w run|strong="H5869"\w* wild.

\w They|strong="H1696"\w* \w mock|strong="H4167"\w* \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* malice; \w with|strong="H1696"\w* arrogance \w they|strong="H1696"\w* \w threaten|strong="H1696"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*.

\w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w set|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H8064"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w against|strong="H3956"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H8064"\w* \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* \w strut|strong="H1980"\w* across \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w place|strong="H1988"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* drink \w up|strong="H7725"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w abundance|strong="H4392"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* wicked say, “\w How|strong="H3045"\w* \w can|strong="H3045"\w* God \w know|strong="H3045"\w*? \w Does|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*?”

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, these \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*—\w always|strong="H5769"\w* \w carefree|strong="H7961"\w* as \w they|strong="H2428"\w* \w increase|strong="H7685"\w* \w their|strong="H7563"\w* \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w*.

Surely \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w vain|strong="H7385"\w* \w I|strong="H2135"\w* have \w kept|strong="H2135"\w* \w my|strong="H7364"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w pure|strong="H2135"\w*; \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w innocence|strong="H5356"\w* \w I|strong="H2135"\w* have \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w my|strong="H7364"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H5060"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* punished \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w speak|strong="H5608"\w* \w this|strong="H2009"\w* way,” \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* would \w have|strong="H1121"\w* betrayed \w Your|strong="H5608"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* tried \w to|strong="H2803"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w troublesome|strong="H5999"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*
\w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w entered|strong="H5704"\w* God’s \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*; then \w I|strong="H5704"\w* discerned \w their|strong="H5704"\w* end.

\w Surely|strong="H5307"\w* You \w set|strong="H7896"\w* \w them|strong="H7896"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* slick \w ground|strong="H2513"\w*; You \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w them|strong="H7896"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* ruin.

How \w suddenly|strong="H7281"\w* \w they|strong="H7281"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H8047"\w*, \w completely|strong="H8552"\w* \w swept|strong="H5486"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w terrors|strong="H1091"\w*!

Like one waking from \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, \w so|strong="H5782"\w* You, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \w awaken|strong="H5782"\w* \w and|strong="H2472"\w* despise \w their|strong="H5782"\w* \w form|strong="H6754"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* \w grieved|strong="H2556"\w* \w and|strong="H3824"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* \w pierced|strong="H8150"\w* \w within|strong="H3629"\w*,

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w senseless|strong="H1198"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w ignorant|strong="H3045"\w*; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* brute beast \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w*.

Yet \w I|strong="H3027"\w* am \w always|strong="H8548"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w*; \w You|strong="H5973"\w* hold \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3947"\w* \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H3947"\w* \w Your|strong="H3947"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* later \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H3947"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w Whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H2654"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H2654"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w*? \w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w on|strong="H5973"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w besides|strong="H5973"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3615"\w* \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w may|strong="H3824"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*, but \w God|strong="H6697"\w* \w is|strong="H3824"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w strength|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H3615"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w Those|strong="H3605"\w* \w far|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* perish; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w destroy|strong="H6789"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H4480"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H2181"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H7896"\w*, \w it|strong="H7896"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H2896"\w* draw \w near|strong="H7132"\w* \w to|strong="H2896"\w* \w God|strong="H3069"\w*. \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H7896"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* may \w proclaim|strong="H5608"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4399"\w*.
